name: Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo HD Remix
name_original: Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo HD Remix
description:
Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo HD Remix is an arcade-fighting game developed by Backbone Emeryville. It came out on 25-11-2008. Capcom published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo HD Remix on PlayStation 3.
